'''Bunshin Phantasm''' is a part of the [[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival]] event.

It can be accessed from the {{Icon|Bunshin Phantasm}} icon.

==Tutorials==
;Bunshin Phantasm
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival Bunshin Phantasm 1.png
|text1    = In "Bunshin Phantasm" challenges, you must reach the destination within {{Color|bp|3 rounds}}. During each round, your actions will be recorded by the Muji-Muji Daruma, and when the next round begins, the Muji-Muji Daruma will imitate your movements from the round before. Use this feature to unlock various devices and solve various puzzles to open the way to the destination...
}}
;Pressure Bridges
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival Bunshin Phantasm 2.png
|text1    = When you or the Muji-Muji Daruma imitating you {{Color|bp|continually}} stand on a pressure plate of a certain color, you will unlock a bridge of the corresponding color. When either of you leaves a pressure plate, the bridge will immediately disappear...
}}
;Overview Mode
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival Bunshin Phantasm 3.png
|text1    = While in overview mode, you can shift your camera and adjust it to view the entire challenge area from above, which will help you better analyze your actions.<br />After completing your actions for one round, you can also replay your previous actions by viewing the Muji-Muji Daruma's imitation of said actions.
}}
;Flower Gates
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival Bunshin Phantasm 4.png
|text1    = Floating Flower Keys are present during the challenges. When you or the Muji-Muji Daruma {{Color|bp|approach}} them, they can be collected and used to open Flower Gates.
}}

{{Description|Though Muji-Muji Daruma is known to jump and bounce about, thus seeming rather light, it can also trigger special pressure-based puzzle mechanisms. So... How heavy is it, exactly?}}
